update.name: Phoca Email
update.description: Phoca Email is Joomla! CMS component. There are different functions of this component: Phoca Email is a newsletter component - newsletters can be sent to subscribers. Phoca Email is used for sending emails from Joomla! components like e.g. sending Invoice, Delivery Note or Receipt from e-commerce components. Phoca Email can be used for sending emails from Joomla! administration site.
